abstract: Appaloosa Management, a hedge fund that has acquired a significant portion of the debt on the troubled Stuyvesant Town and Peter Cooper Village complexes in Manhattan, is seeking to take control of them, City Room reported.
snippet: Appaloosa Management, a hedge fund that has acquired a significant portion of the debt on the troubled Stuyvesant Town and Peter Cooper Village complexes in Manhattan, is seeking to take control of them, City Room reported.
lead_paragraph: From Charles V. Bagli at City Room:
